org.jclouds.elb

Interface ELBClient


  • @Beta
public interface ELBClient
    Provides access to EC2 Elastic Load Balancer via their REST API.

    Author:
    Lili Nader

      • createLoadBalancerInRegion

        @Beta
String createLoadBalancerInRegion(@Nullable
                                     String region,
                                     String name,
                                     String protocol,
                                     int loadBalancerPort,
                                     int instancePort,
                                     String... availabilityZones)
        Creates a load balancer
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the load balancer
        loadBalancerPort - Port for the load balancer to listen on
        instancePort - Port to forward the request to
        availabilityZones - load balancer availability zones
        Returns:
        dns the DNS name for the load balancer
        See Also:
